00025 
00026 #include "PCA9555.h"
00027 #include "i2cmaster.h"
00028 
00029 void PCA9555_init(void) {
00030   i2c_init();
00031 }
00032 
00033 void PCA9555_write(PCA9555_DEVICE dev, PCA9555_REGISTER reg, uint8_t value) {
00034   i2c_start_wait(PCA9555_DEVICE_ADDRESS + dev + I2C_WRITE);
00035   i2c_write(reg);
00036   i2c_write(value);
00037   i2c_stop();
00038 }
00039 
00040 uint8_t PCA9555_read(PCA9555_DEVICE dev, PCA9555_REGISTER reg) {
00041   uint8_t rval;
00042   i2c_start_wait(PCA9555_DEVICE_ADDRESS + dev + I2C_WRITE);
00043   i2c_write(reg);
00044   i2c_rep_start(PCA9555_DEVICE_ADDRESS + dev + I2C_READ);
00045   rval = i2c_readNak();
00046   i2c_stop();
00047   return rval;
00048 }
